title: Somewhere Between Love and Justice
description: Three lives meet at an unimaginable crossroad in this story of love, loss and loyalty in the old west.Sarah Sawyer has spent the last ten years reliving a nightmare. With her horse, Clover, she takes to the trails in search of solitude and revenge. While she shares a common goal and close bond with U.S. Marshall Jessie Walker, another silently holds Sarah's heart.Now a successful saloon owner, Jo Porter has moved on from her past and spent the last year wishing for the return of the mysterious blonde gunslinger who ran off with her heart after a night of passion.A misstep along Sarah's path to justice reunites the pair.Will the gunslinger be able to let love in? Or will her thirst for vengeance lead her down a path of no return?
author: S.W. Andersen
